teaser.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a very difficult question that you have to answer as part of a game or competition
teaser.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a short advertisement which appears a few days or weeks before a full advertisement for a product
teaser.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an advertisement intended to get people’s attention for advertisements that will come later or products that will be available later
teaser.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The teasers urged viewers to tune in at a specific time to watch the launch of the company’s advertising campaign.
